title: Sick of One for All queue dodgers
body:
Isn't the whole point of the game mode to try new things? Getting 4-5 dodges in a row almost every time due to people not liking the champ. Can we reduce the time allowed for bans/picks/runes/masteries so we don't have to wait 10 mins just to get into a game. 

Also, 1 day ban for queue dodgers imo.

replies.body: No, for competitive players you need the time to pick the right runes and masteries for the situation. If you don't like que times pick fill, its what i do.
I agree for the reduce time, but for the 1 day ban no. The queue you get from the ban should be ok and it STACKS as you dodge more queues. So no 1 day ban.

I've dodged a few times. The main reason is people pick useless champs like bard.

I don't know if you find being continually rolled fun, but I dont and will continue to dodge these games
